title: kAmamE narakamaDA
sahitya:
kAmamE narakamaDA un matiyinaik-kalakkiDum virahamaDA aDa manidA


anupallavi

  kOmaLamum kATTik-konjiDum vanjam kottiDum pAmbu tam muttamum nanjAm


caraNam 1    veTTu min naghaiyuDan vizhi valai vIsum veLLap-paNam piDunga uLLurugap-pEshum
paTTum jarigaiyum pagahaTTum paghal vESam paravashap-panjaNai sukham yama pAsham paDu mOsam
    caraNam 2    taLukki minukkuvadum cancala mAyam tazhuvi muyanguvadum azhugaNi nOyE
vazhukki vizhundadum varum kaSTa kAlam varuNa singAramellAm mahEndra jAlam
    caraNam 3    kaNNilum karaindurugak-kavarndiDum tOTram kaNNiyir-sikkinAl kalagap-pOrATTam
alli pOl aNaindunnait-tollaiyil mATTum AyuLaip-pizhindari nOyinil vATTum
    caraNam 4    toTTukkoNDAl un toDarum kavalaiyE tottu nOi pOlum ip-pittaru valaiyE
paTTuk-koNDAl adan bhAram Or malaiyE paghaittuk-koNDAl varum paDu mOsak-kolaiyE
